name: turtle-racing
description: poc of turtle racing project containing full observability ecosystem

scripts.start:dapr-grpc: dapr run --app-id example-pubsub --app-port 50051 --app-protocol grpc --resources-path ./components npm run start
scripts.start:dapr-http: dapr run --app-id example-pubsub --app-port 50051 --app-protocol http --resources-path ./components npm run start
